s: 4 days ago - Some Amazon workers in the US, France, and Italy protested the company's decision to "run normal shifts" due to COVID-19's ease of spread in warehouses. In Spain, the company faced legal complaints over its policies, while a group of US Senators wrote an open letter to Bezos expressing concerns about workplace safety. t: INFORMATION REGARDING AMAZON.COM'S DIRECTORS AND EXECUTIVE OFFICERS
s: INFORMATION REGARDING AMAZON.COM'S DIRECTORS AND EXECUTIVE OFFICERS · EXHIBIT 99.1 ·

1 week ago - In January 2021, Bezos designated Jassy his official successor as CEO; with the transition occurring on July 5, 2021. As CEO of Amazon, Jassy received a ten year pay package totaling $212.7 million. The majority of the compensation package is in stock and vests over 10 years.

Before founding Amazon, Bezos worked for a telecommunications start-up named Fitel. He also worked at Bankers Trust, which is now a part of Deutsche Bank AG, and at hedge fund D.E. Shaw. The net worth of Jeff Bezos as of October 2024. Current position(s): President and chief executive officer
